sense.def:
To divert people or vehicles
pomeni spremeniti smer ali cilj oseb ali vozil.

seg.quote: The police were diverting the traffic.

sense.def:
To divert something
pomeni povzročiti, da nekaj uporabimo v drugačen namen, na primer denar.

seg.quote: We feel it desirable to divert funds from armaments to health and education.

sense.def:
To divert someone's attention
pomeni povzročiti, da nekdo preneha misliti na nekaj in začne misliti na nekaj drugega.
